thread.title: Brilliant hotel with amazing views
thread.title_full: Brilliant hotel with amazing views - Review of Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: NicolaMcManus1
title: Brilliant hotel with amazing views
text:
My Fiance arranged a trip to Paris for my birthday and had originally booked a different hotel but changed to the Pullman after reading reviews. From the moment we arrived the level of service we received was first class.
Our 9th floor room had a large balcony which offered breathtaking views of the Eiffel Tower. For being in the center of Paris, the room was great size. The hotel is located perfectly for all public transport and local amenities.
We had our breakfast brought to the room each morning and ordered room service for dinner which was of a great standard. Would recommend the Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel and if returning to Paris would stay here again.
Room Tip: For best views ask for a higher floor See more room tips
